channel.title: Starting Meepedscape again
channel.description: hello, i have forgoten how to start a server because i have not played in a long time, could someone please send me a link to where i can found out? im sorry if this is wrong section but i dont see anywhere that it says *how to start a new server.*[br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2007, 05:40:39 AM[/size][hr]anyone??[br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2007, 05:43:03 AM[/size][hr]what happened to the nice people who actsualy helped on mopar?

item.title: Starting Meepedscape again
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

meeped:

what happened to the nice people who actsualy helped on mopar?

Theres Still A Few Helpful People But They Aren’t On This Section Of The Forums ATM.

To Start A New Server Download A Source.
Extract It To You Desktop And Open The Folder.
Click On Client.Java
Press Ctrl+H. On The First Line Put The Server’s Name In There
The Second Line Put Your Server Name There… Wait And Save.
Now Your Still In Ctrl+H. First Line Put "admin" Or Whoever The Owner Of The Source Is In Side Quotations.
Save. Then You Have Started Your Own Server.

Read full topic
